summary:
**The Irishman** is a 2019 crime movie directed by Martin Scorsese. It stars Robert De Niro, Al Pacino, and Joe Pesci. The film is about Frank Sheeran, a truck driver turned hitman, who gets involved with the mob and powerful union leader Jimmy Hoffa.

Filming started in 2017 and used special effects to make the actors look younger. The movie is very long, at 209 minutes. It got great reviews and was nominated for many awards, including Best Picture at the Oscars.
title: The Irishman
